  • Method Details

    • takeItem

      public static boolean takeItem(Player player, Place currentPlace, Item item)
      Attempts to take an item from the current place and add it to the player's inventory. Awards take points if it exists.
      Parameters:
      player - the player taking the item
      currentPlace - the place where the item is located
      item - the item to take
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully taken, false otherwise

    • takeAll

      public static void takeAll(Player player, Place currentPlace)
      Takes all items from the current place.
      Parameters:
      player - the player taking items
      currentPlace - the place containing items

    • dropItem

      public static boolean dropItem(Player player, Place currentPlace, Item item)
      Drops an item from the player's inventory into the current place. Awards drop points / location-specific drop points if they exist.
      Parameters:
      player - the player dropping the item
      currentPlace - the place where the item is dropped
      item - the item to drop
      Returns:
      true if the item was dropped, false otherwise

    • listInventory

      public static String listInventory(Player player)
      Returns an inventory list.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose inventory is to be listed
      Returns:
      a string describing the inventory
